definition: a gait faster than a walk, run at a moderately swift pace
details:
noun
- a gait faster than a walk
- a slow pace of running
= synonyms: jog
- a literal translation used in studying a foreign language (often used illicitly)
= synonyms: pony
verb
- run at a moderately swift pace
= synonyms: jog
- cause to trot
= example: cause to trot
- ride at a trot
